title: Registration of order for enforcement
context: ARTICLE 6. REGISTRATION, ENFORCEMENT, AND MODIFICATION OF SUPPORT ORDER Note Article heading amended by L 2015, c 77, pt of §1. PART I. REGISTRATION FOR ENFORCEMENT OF SUPPORT ORDER Note Part heading amended by L 2015, c 77, pt of §1. §576B-601 Registration of order for enforcement. A support order or income withholding order issued in another state or a foreign support order may be registered in this State for enforcement. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
